Refer to USB PD Specification, if not 200 pF as recommendation.
Type-C connector Tx/ Rx AC caps
AC caps for Tx, Rx lanes

In order to avoid EOS damage due to shorting between VBUS and adjacent pins, AC cap with voltage rating >= 50 V is required for both Tx and Rx lanes. The AC cap needs to be next to the connector and followed by ESD diode.
Optional. Selection based on current rating requirement of the platform.
